name: Roasted Chickpea Spinach Salad
preparation: Toss chickpeas with olive oil and spread on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner. Bake, stirring occasionally, until crispy, for 25 minutes. When roasted, remove from oven and toss with seasoning.
Meanwhile, assemble salad by splitting the remaining salad ingredients between bowls or placing in one big serving bowl. Top with warm roasted chickpeas, drizzle with dressing, and season to taste.

products.name: Vegetable Seasoning
summary: All-in-one herby meal helper. Less measuring & more flavor!

products.name: Greek Dressing Mix
summary: Herbs make salad dressings taste great, but they can be a pain to buy and use while fresh. Enter our Greek Dressing to solve the problem. Packed with only good food ingredients, including garlic, oregano, mint, and zero additives, it’s easy to make your own healthy dressing with this simple blend. Just mix it with olive oil and red wine vinegar and give it a shake. Add crumbled feta or Greek yogurt for a creamier dressing.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
